sentences.sContent: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture - controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.sContent_eng: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture - controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.sCn: 半坡锑矿床是典型的断裂控矿，热液充填型矿床。

sentences.sContent: There exist two type mineral deposits including Fuzichong-type skarn deposit and Niuwei-type hydrothermal filling deposit in the Fuzichong Pb-Zn ore belt.
sentences.sContent_eng: There exist two type mineral deposits including Fuzichong-type skarn deposit and Niuwei-type hydrothermal filling deposit in the Fuzichong Pb-Zn ore belt.
sentences.sCn: 佛子冲铅锌成矿带包括两种矿床类型，即佛子冲式夕卡岩型矿床和牛卫式热液充填（交代）型矿床。

sentences.sContent: Shangmanggang tectonic-altered rock type Au deposit is founded in south Lushui-Ruili region. The Au deposit is controlled by source bed, structure and hydrothermal solution.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shangmanggang tectonic-altered rock type Au deposit is founded in south Lushui-Ruili region. The Au deposit is controlled by source bed, structure and hydrothermal solution.
sentences.sCn: 滇西泸水—瑞丽地区南部的上芒岗金矿为该区新发现的构造蚀变岩型金矿，金源、构造、热液蚀变是主要的控矿因素。

phrases.pCn: 热液溶解作用；热水溶液
深海热泉；深海热液喷口

remMethod.val: hydro(水) + therm(热) + al → 热液的
